justification: Resume shows strong academic background but lacks direct experience in business development or B2B sales.
There is no indication of leadership roles or project management experience related to sales.
Skills listed are heavily focused on technical domains unrelated to the job description.
No experience noted in market research or data analytics specific to business growth.

requirements.criteria: 5+ years of experience in business development or sales

personal_info.name: Abdul Basit
personal_info.current_company: Center for Speech and Language Technologies (CSaLT) Lab, LUMS

input.job_description:
### Join Apex Global Solutions as a Business Development Manager  

Apex Global Solutions is seeking a dedicated Business Development Manager to bolster our B2B sales efforts and enhance our market presence. This role requires a strategic thinker with the ability to forge and maintain robust client relationships, lead market analysis, and drive revenue growth through innovative sales strategies.

#### Key Responsibilities  
- Develop and implement strategic business development plans to meet organizational goals.
- Identify and qualify new business opportunities and partnerships.
- Lead market research to determine new market segments and customer needs.
- Foster long-term relationships with clients through successful engagement and collaboration.
- Track and report on key business metrics, providing insights and data-driven recommendations to executive leadership.
- Collaborate with internal teams to ensure alignment and excellence in service delivery.

#### Required Skills  
- Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Proven experience in B2B sales and marketing, particularly in IT and manufacturing sectors.
- Proficient in market research and data analysis.
- Strong leadership and project management capabilities.

#### Benefits  
- Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
- Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement.
- Health and wellness benefits package.
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment.

Join us to spearhead business growth initiatives that deliver significant value and drive our mission forward.
input.additional_info: Preferred candidates are from top-tier institutes such as COMSATS University Lahore and Superior University Lahore. Apex Global Solutions supports relocation for the right candidate and offers remote working options. Our hiring process includes a detailed assessment of sales strategies, technical skills through practical scenarios, and behavioral interviews to evaluate cultural fit.
minimum_requirements: 5+ years of experience in business development or sales
input.resume:
Abdul Basit
/githubabdulbasit.github.io |/envel⌢peabasit@lums.edu.pk |♂¶obile+923347904824
Education
University of Hertfordshire, Hatfield, United Kingdom
Masters in Artificial Intelligence With Robotics Sep 2018 – Dec 2020
Major Courses: Theory & Practice of Artificial Intelligence, Neural Networks & Machine Learning, Artificial Life
with Robotics, Advanced Research Topics in Computer Science.
MS Projects:
•Thermal Image Face Identification: Implemented an encoder-decoder algorithm to classify thermal images of
41 unique human faces, integrating custom filters to enhance accuracy. Research validated that filters improved
accuracy.
•Fusion-Fission Dynamics: A study in robotics and artificial life, designed with Netlogo programming and con-
structed using Thymio robots to explore the interplay between individual autonomy and collective behavior.
•Age-of-Empires-with-AI: A real-time strategy game developed to investigate and compare the performance of AI
algorithms, involving null hypothesis testing and SPSS analysis.
University of Management & Technology, Lahore, Pakistan
Bachelors in Software Engineering Feb 2012 – June 2017
Major Courses: Artificial Intelligence Information Retrieval Digital Image & Processing.
BS Projects:
•Image Restoration System: Built using MATLAB, this system utilizes inverse filtering to reverse image blurring
and restore its feature’s accuracy. Research validated that filters improved accuracy.
•Snakes Xenzia: This project examines how enhanced complexity and visual improvements impact user engagement
and gameplay experience, incorporating HCI principles to evaluate usability and interaction quality.
EXPERIENCE
Center for Speech and Language Technologies (CSaLT) Lab, LUMS, Lahore, Pakistan
Research Associate Jan 2023 – Present
•Formulated strategies: To assist in the socio-economic development of low-literate and non-affluent individuals
through improved information access and connectivity.
•Urdu Synonym: Engineered an application using embeddings to enhance Urdu language synonym processing,
reducing processing time by over 300 % .
•Urdu-Alpaca: Translated the Alpaca dataset into Urdu using GPT and fine-tuned the LLaMa model with PEFT
techniques.
•Urdu-QA: Designed a prototype question-answer application for the Urdu language, using translation techniques
to obtain quality embeddings. Users can ask questions and retrieve the top K similar questions, enabling them
to find and access the most relevant answers.
•Phoneme Distribution: Efficiently managed a multi-million-word dataset using parallel processing with threads
in a resource-limited environment to obtain phoneme distribution as part of a research project.
•Urdu-Translation: Evaluated four different models on five diverse datasets using SacreBLEU andCHrf ++
metrics as part of a research project.
Department of Computer Science, TMUC, Lahore, Pakistan
Visiting Lecturer Sep 2021 – Dec 2022
•H-671: Introduction to Robotics Fall 2021•K-618: Computing Research Project Spring 20222
•H-74738: Machine Learnig Spring 2022
•K-618: Computing Research Project Fall 2022
•H-671: Introduction to Robotics Fall 2022
Publications
Basit, Abdul, Abdul Hameed Azeemi, and Agha Ali Raza (2024). “Challenges in Urdu Machine Translation”. In:
Proceedings of the The Seventh Workshop on Technologies for Machine Translation of Low-Resource Languages
(LoResMT 2024) , pp. 44–49. url:https://aclanthology.org/2024.loresmt-1.4/ .
Skills
Natural Language Processing
Text Preprocessing, Language Modeling, Text Representation, Name Entity Recognition, Machine Translation, Ques-
tion Answer System, Sentiment Analysis, Evaluation Metrics, RAG.
Large Language Models
LLM Architectures, Fine-Tuning, and Transfer Learning, Training LLMs.
Technical
TensorFlow, PyTorch, LangChain, NLTK, SpaCy, NumPy, Pandas, Colab, Python, Bash, C++, C#, LaTeX, SQL,
Hugging Face.
Achievement’s
•Earned the Kaggle Notebooks Master award and ranked in the top 1 percentage of the platform.
•Published 12 technical articles on Medium and achieved contributor status at Towards AI.
•Created 5 deep learning tutorials for my YouTube channel, achieving 4,000 views.
REFERENCES
Dr. Agha Ali Raza |Research Supervisor
Assistant Professor, Department of Computer Science, LUMS
Email: agha.ali.raza@lums.edu.pk |Website
Dr Na Helian |Research Supervisor
Principal Lecturer, Department of Computer Science, UFH
Email: n.helian@herts.ac.uk |Website
